text:
Exotic Objects | NYC-based (remote is fine)

We're a small dev shop looking for both modern Javascript devs (ES6, Backbone, etc) and python devs (with Django experience) to work on a long term project for big name client. Looking to form long-term relationships for new and ongoing work.

At least 5 years experience.

Close to Eastern time zone is preferred.

contact: jobs at extc.co
